mapper.insert: SELECT c.contents, c.update_time, c.cmlayer, c.comment_croup, u.nickname, b.board_id FROM comment c INNER JOIN board b on c.board_id = b.board_id INNER JOIN user u on b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.board_id = #{id};
INSERT INTO comment(reg_time, update_time, cmlayer, comment_croup, contents, status) VALUES (now(), now(), 0, #{comment_croup}, #{contents}, "Y")
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET contents = #{contents}, update_time = now() WHERE comment_id = #{id}
